data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
German Cano hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for Vasco da Gama!
In the minute 1, Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira awards Santos a goal kick.
Free kick for Santos in the half of Vasco da Gama.
Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Santos just outside Vasco da Gama's area.
In the minute 5, Carlos Sanchez (Santos) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Santos have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira.
Santos are pushing forward but Lucas Verissimo's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 5, Goal kick for Vasco da Gama at Urbano Caldeira.
Can Vasco da Gama get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos's half?
Santos have a goal kick.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Santos in their own half.
Throw-in for Santos in the half of Vasco da Gama.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 11, Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
In the minute 12, Throw-in Vasco da Gama.
Vasco da Gama to take a throw-in in Santos territory.
In Santos a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
Ygor Catatau for Vasco da Gama is back on the field again.
In the minute 15, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Ygor Catatau.
In the minute 16, Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira signals a Santos throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half.
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 18, Santos's Yeferson Soteldo is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 21, Corner awarded to Santos.
Santos move into a 1-0 lead through a Lucas Verissimo header.
Yeferson Soteldo with an assist there.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Vasco da Gama at Urbano Caldeira.
Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Can Vasco da Gama get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos's half?
In the minute 24, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Yeferson Soteldo for Santos is whistled offside.
Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 27, Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama.
At Urbano Caldeira, Jobson has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 29, Santos have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
In the minute 31, Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira waits before resuming play because Marinho for Santos is still down.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Santos.
Marinho returns to the field for Santos after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 34, Ball goes out of play for a Vasco da Gama goal kick.
Corner awarded to Santos.
Corner awarded to Santos.
In the minute 35, Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Free kick Vasco da Gama.
Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira awards Santos a goal kick.
In the minute 37, Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yeferson Soteldo of Santos smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Vasco da Gama push forward at Urbano Caldeira and Yago Pikachu gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Santos defence.
In the minute 41, Vasco da Gama have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira.
Goal! The away team draw level at 1-1 through Fellipe Bastos.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the away team in Santos.
The 1st half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Ball goes out of play for a Vasco da Gama goal kick.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
Luan Peres is replacing Jobson for the home team.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 46, In Santos a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Santos to take a throw-in in Vasco da Gama territory.
Ball safe as Vasco da Gama is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 48, Santos's Para misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Vasco da Gama at Urbano Caldeira.
Vasco da Gama will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Santos.
In the minute 50, In Santos Santos drive forward through Yeferson Soteldo. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Santos to check on Fernando Miguel, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 52, Vasco da Gama's Fernando Miguel looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Vasco da Gama's Andrey gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Santos have a goal kick.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Santos in the half of Vasco da Gama.
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
In the minute 56, Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira signals a throw-in for Vasco da Gama, close to Santos's area.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
Santos's Para has run offside.
Free kick Santos.
In the minute 58, Miranda (Vasco da Gama) has received a yellow card from Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira.
Marinho is on target to give Santos a 2-1 advantage.
In the minute 60, Free kick for Vasco da Gama in the half of Santos.
Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Santos.
The away team have replaced Juninho with Ribamar. This is the first substitution made today by Ramon Menezes.
In the minute 64, Marinho (Santos) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Santos.
Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira signals a Santos throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half.
In the minute 65, Throw-in for Santos in the half of Vasco da Gama.
Goal kick for Vasco da Gama at Urbano Caldeira.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 67, Vasco da Gama awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vasco da Gama have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira.
In the minute 68, Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira signals a Santos throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half.
An attacking Vasco da Gama player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
German Cano scores from the spot to level the match at 2-2.
In the minute 74, Vasco da Gama to take a throw-in in Santos territory.
The away team replace Ygor Catatau with Bruno Cesar.
Guilherme Parede is replacing German Cano for Vasco da Gama at Urbano Caldeira.
In the minute 76, Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
Corner awarded to Santos.
Santos are coming forward and Felipe Jonatan gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 78, Vasco da Gama have a goal kick.
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yago Pikachu (Vasco da Gama) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 80, Can Vasco da Gama get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos's half?
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
Jean Mota is on a sub for Felipe Jonatan for Santos.
In the minute 82, Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira signals a Santos throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half.
Santos attack but Marinho's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 82, Ball goes out of play for a Vasco da Gama goal kick.
Cuca is making the team's third substitution at Urbano Caldeira with Kaio Jorge replacing Raniel.
The match at Urbano Caldeira has been interrupted briefly for a check on Jean Mota, who is down injured.
In the minute 84, Can Santos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half?
Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama.
Jean Mota, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Arthur Gomes is the substitute for Santos.
Fellipe Bastos for Vasco da Gama drives towards goal at Urbano Caldeira. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama close to the penalty box.
In the minute 86, Santos's Diego Pituca has been booked in Santos.
Carlos Sanchez gets his shot on target but fails to score for Santos.
In the minute 88, Ribamar for the away team is judged to be offside.
Can Santos capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Vasco da Gama's half?
Ball safe as Vasco da Gama is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Vasco da Gama drives forward and Ribamar gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama at Urbano Caldeira.
6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Santos have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira.
Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira awards Vasco da Gama a goal kick.
Free kick for Santos in the half of Vasco da Gama.
Carlinhos of Vasco da Gama gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Santos.
Corner awarded to Santos.
Lucas Verissimo of Santos gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Vasco da Gama goal kick.
The match has come to a close in Santos. The final score is 2-2.
The away team have replaced Martin Benitez with Neto Borges. This is the fourth substitution made today by Ramon Menezes.
Carlinhos is replacing Fellipe Bastos for Vasco da Gama at Urbano Caldeira.
Santos make their fifth substitution with Lucas Braga replacing Alison.
Henrique Silva (Vasco da Gama) gets booked by Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira, and will miss the next match due to the number of yellow cards received this season.
Guilherme Parede for Vasco da Gama has been booked by Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira and receives a first yellow card.
